name: Misadventures of Laura Silver: Chapter II
name_original: Misadventures of Laura Silver: Chapter II
description:
From the creators of Misadventures of Laura Silver, comes the second chapter!

After their misadventures in Pilsen, the detectives (and Uri!) are ready to explore Bayeux for another. This time, their target is the White Lady who awaits a suitable partner to dance with.

Now, another king disrupts their adventure, suspicious townsfolk avoid talking with them and Silver faints all of a sudden!
Will they be able to reach their objective this time?

Features


  • Your story & decisions carry over from the first chapter.
  • 60.000+ words.
  • Six hours of total gameplay.
  • Dozens of decisions.
  • Multiple endings.
  • Visual novel with new minigame elements.
  • Available for Windows, Mac & Ubuntu.

.
